explains: n. 头盔，安全帽；（尤指唇形科和兰科花朵的）花冠盔瓣，唇瓣；冠螺
wordGroup: safety helmet 安全帽，安全头盔
welding helmet n. 焊工帽；焊工面罩
crash helmet 安全帽；（飞行员，摩托车驾驶员等的）防撞头盔

sentences.en: He locked his helmet into position with a click.
sentences.cn: 他喀哒一声把头盔扣好。

sentences.en: A man in a crash helmet was mounting a motorcycle.
sentences.cn: 一个戴着防撞头盔的男子正骑上一辆摩托车。

sentences.en: He waved back, put down the kickstand, and took off his helmet.
sentences.cn: 他向后挥挥手，放下撑脚架，并脱掉他的头盔。
